text: Mangala Pinsiri Samaraweera (21 April 1956 â€“ 24 August 2021) (, ; ) was a Sri Lankan politician. He was also the first openly gay politician from Sri Lanka. He was the Minister of Finance from 2017 to 2019, and the Minister of Foreign Affairs, for two terms from 2005 to 2007 and 2015 to 2017. He was born in Matara, Sri Lanka. Samaraweera died at a hospital in Colombo, Sri Lanka on 24 August 2021 from COVID-19, aged 65. ==References== Category:1956 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Sri Lankan politicians Category:LGBT politicians Category:Gay men Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Sri Lanka
